descriptions.short: Protect your devices with AI-powered DNS filtering. Block ads, trackers, malware, and phishing in real-time.
descriptions.full:
Shield AI is the next-generation DNS protection app that uses artificial intelligence to keep your devices safe from online threats.

üõ°Ô∏è REAL-TIME PROTECTION

üö´ AD & TRACKER BLOCKING
‚Ä¢ Block intrusive ads across all apps and browsers

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ FAMILY PROTECTION
